data.text: Norway's breathtaking scenery is calling! We are flying between Helsinki and Bergen and Tromsø from 14 December 2021. In the summer season, we'll also fly to Trondheim. https://t.co/I7RepBG7mw https://t.co/uX8dLvltnG

Travelling to Singapore? We now have confirmation that all our Helsinki–Singapore flights from 29 November 2021 until 26 March 2022 have the VTL status. Read more from our travel update: https://t.co/i9uuMwNCE4. Finnair flies to Singapore four times a week. https://t.co/p1NCmon1Ga

data.text: @RGiesecke Hi, we are having some problems with our Manage booking service. Those are being fixed and we hope to have it working as soon as possible. I am sincerely very sorry for the inconvenience! Thank you for your patience and understanding. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@pekka_aula Hei, olen todella pahoillani pitkistä jonoista asiakaspalvelukanavissamme. Saamme tällä hetkellä ennätysmäärän yhteydenottoja. Kiitos kärsivällisyydestä! Ystävällisin terveisin, Ada/Finnair

@sbllmnc Hi, I am extremely sorry that there are problems in our Manage booking service. We are working on the issue and hoping to get it fixed as soon as possible. I apologize for the inconvenience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@SweMome @FinnairHelps @finnair_sg We are currently in the process of applying the VTL status for HEL-SIN flights. We will provide more information as soon as the confirmation has been received. We aim to operate all our Singapore flights with VTL status as of 29 November 2021 onwards. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

Did you know that by reducing the weight of your baggage by 5kg, you reduce your carbon footprint by about 5%? So how can you succeed at packing lighter and taking with you only the most essential? Check out our cabin crew’s tips for packing smart. https://t.co/gOrmtTbibo

urls.title: Cabin crew tips: The art of packing
urls.description: When it comes to packing light and tight, flight attendants do know best. Cabin crew member Elina Poutanen has a set routine and shares her four tips for fitting it all into a carry-on. Even the most seasoned traveller stresses about what to pack in a carry-on bag. Cabin crew member Elina Poutanen shares four tried and true packing hacks for any trip. “I always start packing by checking the weather forecast. This way I have the right clothes and don’t pack any unnecessary items. I also like to think

data.text: @DeeHartnett Sorry to hear that! You can also reach our customer service via chat: https://t.co/Ns03Gpyf5p Heidi / Finnair
@crazyforkareena Hi, you can find information about baggage fees on our website: https://t.co/tBebzpUUvm Heidi / Finnair

urls.title: Extra baggage fees
urls.description: Extra baggage fees apply when the bags exceed the Finnair baggage allowance included in your ticket. Check how many bags are allowed and how to buy extra baggage.

data.text: @DeeHartnett Hi, our customer service is unfortunately very congested. We are really sorry about that. Has your friend tried to change their flight through Manage Booking on our website? https://t.co/y4866cjM53 Heidi / Finnair

In our simple checklist for travelling, you can find advice on what to do before, during and after your flight for travelling safely. Many health and safety measures are in place to ensure your well-being throughout the journey. https://t.co/c9LWBZrZrT

data.text: Fully vaccinated travellers from Finland and Sweden can travel to Singapore as of 29 November 2021 without quarantine thanks to the Vaccinated Travel Lane (VTL) agreement. data.text: In the summer season 2022, we will fly to nearly 100 destinations. Our new long-haul destinations include Dallas, Busan and Tokyo Haneda, and Sapporo as a summer destination for the first time. In Europe, our new destinations are Larnaca and Zagreb. https://t.co/2qN3ykPKwH https://t.co/Jaz4ABOyZU

@SaraSarakanti Hi, I am extremely sorry for your loss and bad experience. We offer our Book with confidence policy when you buy your ticket directly through Finnair: https://t.co/NQN3hfqxdl. If you have bought your ticket from Kayak, please contact them about this. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Change your booking flexibly
urls.description: With our updated ticket policy, you can now change your travel dates with more flexibility. Book Finnair flights and travel with confidence!

data.text: @NatashaAlcivar2 Hi, we are resuming the AY008 Miami-Helsinki flight on Nov 30, 2021. Could this have been a codeshare flight or a flight to Stockholm, perhaps? This information is also communicated on our website: https://t.co/iWb8OAoGes. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

The USA is finally open for travel! ✈️🇺🇸 You can travel there if you have received 2 doses of vaccination at least 14 days before and have a negative coronavirus test result taken within 3 calendar days before your trip. Check what's required in detail: https://t.co/aNeU58WjqQ. https://t.co/vHXYhGSTFU

data.text: In October, Finnair carried 433,300 passengers, which was 330.0% more than in October 2020. The number of passengers in October 2021 was 45.3% more than in September 2021. https://t.co/FkVGBMMhor https://t.co/XZ1sW3IeM8

Check your destination’s travel requirements easily in the travel restrictions map on our website: https://t.co/XzcJcjKWCI. The same map is used by our customer service. We currently get exceptionally many calls and are unable to answer questions regarding travel restrictions. https://t.co/JNRuq3Y0lU

data.text: @tcarnegytan @FinnairHelps Hi, I apologize for the long lines in our customer service channels. We are working on it and training new employees, but this takes time, unfortunately. Please try again our chatbot or by calling us: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Thank you for your patience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

Finnair is a front runner in utilizing flight data to create solutions for better fleet optimization. Route and aircraft management are always done with fuel efficiency in mind, aiming to find even more efficient ways to lower fuel use and emissions. https://t.co/tNETpx30IK

Finnair complements Turku and Tampere flight connections with bus connections to lower the CO2 footprint of the route as of summer 2022. You can read more here: https://t.co/xTfvUW056n https://t.co/ebXemzt5FJ

We start co-operation with Pihlajalinna on 3 November 2021 and offer you affordable and easy access to coronavirus testing prior to travel. As a Finnair customer, you can get an RT-PCR test for €93 and a rapid antigen test for €80. Read more: https://t.co/LzGZBYEgSs https://t.co/iSnZl5raul

data.text: Today, we celebrate our 98th birthday! We hope that you have made many great memories with us throughout the years – we, for sure, have enjoyed flying you to different places around the world. 💙 We will continue our journey towards the big 100, see you on board! https://t.co/bXB2x06QbR
@turkka_leppaaho Thank you so much!
@paivyttallqvist Ihania muistoja, kiitos Päivyt! Skoolatkaamme yhdessä tänään mustikkamehulla!

@AjVikman Hei, asiakaspalvelumme on kyllä auki, mutta valitettavan ruuhkautunut tällä hetkellä. Koulutamme asiakaspalvelukanaviimme paraikaa uusia työntekijöitä, mutta tässä kestää työn vaatiessa monipuolista erityisosaamista. Ystävällisin terveisin, Ada/Finnair

The Singapore authorities have introduced requirements for customers transferring via Singapore to a third country. Transferring via Singapore is now possible with certain conditions. Read more about them on our website. https://t.co/KGwWxbtPp5
We have added several frequencies to many of our European destinations, such as Berlin, Milan and Lapland for the Christmas holiday season.✈️ Check the schedules and book at https://t.co/FE22wx9zBM.

Travelling through an airport can be stressful and slow at times. Save yourself some time and follow our tips on how to get through the airport smoother and with less stress next time you will be coming to Helsinki Airport.
https://t.co/yoq9MYIUNA

urls.title: How to get through the airport faster
urls.description: Save yourself some time and follow our tips to get through the airport with less stress. We recommend thinking ahead, starting from advance check-in that saves a lot of time and effort. The easiest way to check-in is with the Finnair mobile app. When you use the app, not only can you store your boarding pass, but you get real-time updates and other services such as the option to upgrade to Business Class or to purchase your seat assignment. Of course, sitting in the front of the aircraft always gives you

data.text: RT @FinnairCargo: First cargo shipments started their journey from @Arlanda to Bangkok @suvarnabhumiair onboard @Finnair Airbus A350 tonigh…

@Onni_Nguyen Hei, juuri näin. Tulee olla tuplarokotettu viimeistään 14 vuorokautta aikaisemmin JA käydä testissä 72 tunnin sisällä ennen matkaan lähtöä ja sitten vielä Thaimaan lentokentällä sinne saapuessa. -Ada/Finnair

Amazing news! Thailand opens for travel for fully vaccinated travellers from 46 countries from 1 November onwards. You will need to take RT-PCR test within 72h before travel. When arriving in Thailand, you will need to take another RT-PCR test. Read more: https://t.co/p9XdTDY6lT https://t.co/SsiPsvjT0H

data.text: @KangasluomaL Hei, pahoittelut teknisestä ongelmasta! Hyvä kuulla, että sait lennot kuitenkin varattua. Mukavaa lentomatkaa! Ystävällisin terveisin, Ada/Finnair

@tomi @AmericanAir Hei, syy, miksi emme voi hyväksyä lemmikkejä kaukolentojen businessluokkaan on, että lemmikki tulee meillä pitää lennon ajan edessä olevan istuimen alla kuljetuslaukussa ja laukulle ei valitettavasti ole tilaa vuodeistuimen jalkatilassa. Ystävällisin terveisin, Ada/Finnair

entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

data.text: RT @AirbusPRESS: Airbus receives first #A320 Flight Hour Services maintenance contract in Europe to support @Finnair’s entire single aisle…

Flying from HEL to ARN this Fri or Sat? You might be in for a nice surprise. Flights AY819 on 22 Oct and AY801 on 23 Oct will be operated with our wide-body A350 aircraft. Our first direct long-haul flights from Stockholm are leaving this weekend. https://t.co/6g9bigL9G2

What’s it like to work as Finnair Kitchen’s Head chef and how did Japanese Koji Moriwaki end up there? For International Chef's Day, we share Koji’s story and want to thank all the chefs around the world for their valuable work. 🤍 https://t.co/RCSu6GSIY4
@chadloder @FinnairHelps Hi, thank you for flagging this. I'll share this with our marketing team so they can take action. Heidi / Finnair

data.text: @R150193 Hi, I am very sorry that you haven't been able to reach our customer service. We are aware that the lines are very long and we are training new employees, but unfortunately, this takes time. Please try again to get through the chat. Thank you for your patience! -Ada/Finnair
@kauneuskeskus Hei, emme valitettavasti tällä hetkellä lennä ollenkaan Kemiin. Kemiä lähimmäksi lennämme Ouluun tai Rovaniemeen: https://t.co/I5n8RXjrkv. Ystävällisin terveisin, Ada/Finnair

@HJauhiainen @FinnairSuomi Hi, due to the pandemic, there are still changes in our flights and schedules. This causes uncertainty for carrying pets and we are unable to confirm the transportation early enough. I don't have any info yet on when we can restart the service, but hopefully soon! -Ada/Finnair

data.text: @RodneyCintron Hi, if you are fully vaccinated at least 2 weeks before arriving in Finland, you do not need a coronavirus test. You can read more at https://t.co/diJSSEzRB8 and https://t.co/gFcDo9W37x. Happy traveling! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Travelling to Finland
urls.description: Finland has opened for travel from the EU and Schengen countries. Travel from outside of the EU and Schengen area remains restricted. Finnish authorities define the entry requirements to Finland. See more detailed instructions below. Please also note that travel restrictions are subject to change at short notice. As a traveller, you are always responsible for ensuring that you fulfil the requirements of your destination and possible transit country. You can check the current entry restrictions to Finland

urls.title: Travel requirements map
urls.description: Use the interactive travel map to find out where you can fly with Finnair and what guidelines you need to follow in each destination.

data.text: @CamillaKari Hei, valitettavasti meillä on rajattu valikoima ennakkotilausaterioita ja näistä vaihtoehdoista kasvisaterian hintaan sisältyy viini, joten tätä ei voi alaikäisille tilata. Olen pahoillani tästä ja välittänyt palautteen eteenpäin. Ystävällisin terveisin, Ada/Finnair

@IiroRantala Hei, koneesta riveittäin poistumisella pyritään säilyttämään turvavälejä ja ylimääräisiä kontakteja. Pandemian aikaisia hygienia- ja turvallisuustoimiamme on listattu tänne: https://t.co/6pqg8czrTA. -Ada/Finnair

Time to fly! Welcome onboard – we are happy to take you to your favourite destinations. The world is opening and many destinations await. Where will you travel next? https://t.co/wLlLjsH4sn https://t.co/kFZXBe4cO7

urls.title: Fly to over 100 destinations with Finnair
urls.description: Finnair flies the shorter, faster route between Europe and Asia. Modern fleet – more comfort, lower emissions. Search and book your flights today.

data.text: @jlysti Hi, I am very sorry for the long queue in our customer service channels. We acknowledge the problem and are currently training new personnel. Unfortunately this takes time as the job requires special knowledge of the industry and systems. Thank you for your patience! -Ada/Finnair
Bom dia Lisboa! 🇵🇹 We have added more flights to Lisbon for December 2021–March 2022 and adjusted our flight schedule. https://t.co/TUW5jTQnlf.
@AlexZischow Hi, you should be able to book an award flight with your points now. Sorry for the delay and inconvenience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
Guten Tag, Berlin! 🇩🇪 We have added one weekly frequency to Berlin for Wednesdays from 10 November 2021 to 8 December 2021. https://t.co/cXjtltiUJ3
Ciao Milano! 🇮🇹 We have added one weekly frequency to Milan for Saturdays from 20 November 2021 to 11 December 2021. https://t.co/Y44ODtfBr6

Enchanting and impressive architecture, more art than you can possibly consume during your trip and mouth-watering delicacies. The forever-favourite destination Barcelona never grows old. https://t.co/7lAyxDISyb
@mpihjapan Hi, Fukuoka is a seasonal route for us and the last flight, HEL-FUK, is planned to be operated on 29 October 2022. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@PassportHistory Hi, we are improving our booking process and booking award flights is not possible until tomorrow. You should be able to book them again from 15 October onwards, hopefully even sooner. I apologise for the inconvenience. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@gauravflyer2787 Hi, we will start flying from Helsinki to Delhi again on 6 December 2021. You can check the schedule on our website: https://t.co/OygDnQdT5E. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

We have added flights to Japan for summer season 2022. From 27.4.2022, we will operate two weekly flights from Helsinki to Sapporo on Wednesdays and Sundays. To Osaka, we will have two daily flights throughout the summer season. Fukuoka flights will start on 26.4.2022. https://t.co/qRvlFZH3r3
@Peppepappa Hei, suuret pahoittelut tästä! Voit myös koittaa olla meihin yhteydessä chatin välityksellä: https://t.co/UxyjiqVKtR. Ystävällisin terveisin, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Lennä yli 100 kohteeseen Finnairilla
urls.description: Finnair lentää lyhyttä ja nopeaa reittiä Euroopan ja Aasian välillä. Löydä suorat lennot lukuisiin kohteisiin ympäri maailman ja varaa lentoliput jo tänään.

data.text: @pbquach Hi, I am extremely sorry for the long waiting times in our customer service channels. We acknowledge the issue and are working on getting there more employees soon. I hope you got your problem solved! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@piet94407883 Hi, when you book the journey from Amsterdam to Rovaniemi with us, your checked baggage will be automatically transferred at Helsinki Airport, so you don't have to worry about that. Happy travels! -Ada/Finnair

@Makkarainen2 @VlimkiMarita @FinnairSuomi Hei, olen erittäin pahoillani pitkästä odotusajasta asiakaspalveluumme. Tiedostamme, että jonot ovat liian pitkiä ja koulutamme asiakaspalvelukanaviimme paraikaa lisää työntekijöitä. Toivottavasti sait asiasi ratkaistua! Ystävällisin terveisin, Ada/Finnair

@Peppepappa Hei, olen erittäin pahoillani pitkästä odotusajasta asiakaspalveluumme. Tiedostamme, että jonot ovat tällä hetkellä liian pitkiä ja koulutamme asiakaspalvelukanaviimme paraikaa lisää työntekijöitä. Toivottavasti sait asiasi ratkaistua! Ystävällisin terveisin, Ada/Finnair

@martlo @TopiManner Hei, olen pahoillani, mikäli sivuillamme on ollut vanhentunutta tietoa. Voit käyttää apunasi matkustusrajoituskarttaamme: https://t.co/tjmTl0UyLo. Viimeisimmät matkustusrajoitukset kannattaa aina tarkistaa kohdemaan virallisilta sivuilta. Ystävällisin terveisin, Ada/Finnair
@gingerarab @FinnairHelps Hi, thank you for the nice feedback, we are glad you enjoyed your time on board with us! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@NaavUmashanker @FinnairHelps Hi, I am very sorry for the long queue in our customer service. Please try contacting us through the Chat service on our website: https://t.co/wLlLjsH4sn. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Fly to over 100 destinations with Finnair
urls.description: Finnair flies the shorter, faster route between Europe and Asia. Modern fleet – more comfort, lower emissions. Search and book your flights today.

data.text: @JariJMakkonen Hei, olen erittäin pahoillani, että asiakaspalvelumme on ruuhkautunut. Tiedostamme, että jonot todellakin ovat liian pitkiä ja koulutammekin paraikaa uusia työntekijöitä. Voit myös olla yhteydessä meihin verkkosivujemme chat-palvelun kautta. Ystävällisin terveisin, Ada/Finnair

@WorldAviationHD Hi, please contact our customer service through the chat on our website https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy and ask there whether this kind of change in your booking is possible. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@flyingwithbaby @FinnairHelps Hi, our customer service is currently handling a large number of requests. Please try contacting us through the chat service on our website: https://t.co/FE22wx9zBM. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Fly to over 100 destinations with Finnair
urls.description: Finnair flies the shorter, faster route between Europe and Asia. Modern fleet – more comfort, lower emissions. Search and book your flights today.

data.text: In September, Finnair carried 298,200 passengers, which was 158.1% more than in September 2020. The number of passengers in September 2021 was 11.9% more than in August 2021. https://t.co/4rvr2xevuA https://t.co/6FrxXkKPDV

@ArhoSuominen @FinnairSuomi Hei, olen pahoillani pitkästä jonosta asiakaspalvelussamme. Meillä on tiedossa, että käsittelyajat ovat aivan liian pitkiä ja teemme töitä, jotta saamme asian pian korjattua. Olen pyytänyt asiakaspalveluamme olemaan sinuun suoraan yhteydessä. Ystävällisin terveisin, Ada/Finnair

Where in Chicago do you go for the most delicious deep-dish pizza? What’s the best place to catch a set of blues? Chicago local @Crescenzo shares an insider’s guide to five Windy City experiences you won’t want to miss. https://t.co/T5z19KwLfI
